attributes.action: ban the British National Party from political affairs in England until they change their racist views.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BNP are a racist party who say they oppose illegal immigration,however they want all people who aren't white to be deported out of this country. They continually give false facts & figures such as: in 60 years the indigenous British people will be an ethnic mintority.
